WriterDuet An extensive desktop app for fully writing a screenplay or convert between various screenplay formats such as final draft fdx or fountain CC0-1.0 LicenseRef-proprietary https://writersolo.com
WriterSolo is a free version of WriterDuet that is not synced to any servers.
You get all the same features of WriterDuet, just without collaboration or any connection to an external server
You can seamlessly convert from fdx, to fountain, or even PDF.
